[Sluggish Bracelet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2388)
</title>

<traits>

<trait label="Cursed" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=274" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 193 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A silver charm bracelet, a _sluggish bracelet_ appears to be a [_bracelet of dashing_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=415), granting you a +1 item bonus to [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) checks. If the curse goes unrecognized, you think you can Activate it to gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed for 1 minute. Instead, its activation is as follows.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))    **Effect** You take a –10-foot penalty to your Speed for 1 minute, and the bracelet fuses to you. Thereafter, it grants you no bonus to Acrobatics checks, and it imposes a –5-foot status penalty to your Speed.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
